text: Don't make yourself at home, you're not officially welcome here. That's a fact
After a while you learn to ignore the names people call you and just trust who you are
If that was me, you'd be dead
Hey! I'm no one's messenger boy, all right? I'm a delivery boy
Well, I have to save my ass
I'm going to be a father, how did this happen?
I live in a swamp! I put up signs! I'm a terrifying ogre! What do I have to do to get a little privacy?
This is the part where you run away
Well my stomach aches and my palms just got sweaty, must be a high school
Well, that's not very nice. It's just a donkey
No! Layers! Onions have layers. Ogres have layers
I read it in a book once
